snippet: The Swiss drug maker Roche said on Friday that the Food and Drug Administration approved its drug Avastin as a treatment for ovarian cancer.
abstract: Swiss drug maker Roche announces that Food and Drug Administration has approved its drug Avastin as treatment for ovarian cancer.
lead_paragraph: The Swiss drug maker Roche said on Friday that the Food and Drug Administration approved its drug Avastin as a treatment for ovarian cancer.

headline.main: F.D.A. Approves Avastin as Ovarian Cancer Treatment
headline.print_headline: F.D.A. Approves Avastin as Ovarian Cancer Treatment
